name: 1010 Hexagon Puzzle: Relax Gam
description:
1010 Block Hexagon is a challenging puzzle game with a simple gameplay. It can be played within 30 seconds to train your brain and develop your mental skills as well as keeping you mentally fit. It is a perfect period of refreshment in metro, bus, school or in the office.

Features:
Top-notch quality
Amazing gameplay
Minimalistic user interface
Many boards to play
Strong adjustable AI
Classic Hexxagon game
